overview: Laly, who has been investigating Dorian for several months, succeeds, during a very thorough interrogation, to extract information from him on his numerous sexual escapades ... Excited, but wanting to punish this inveterate macho, the detective delivers his prisoner to an educator a little peculiar, charged to put it back in the right way. The offender then discovers the reverse of the decor of his orgies, which is for him to find himself in the skin of his victims, as a simple submissive ...
title: The Detective
